title: INCREDIBLE HYPNOTIC JOURNEY: PART 2 - HYPNOTIC CRISIS (NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS)
description:
This is the second episode of this video. You can watch the first video here: https://youtu.be/ieboM-Vw6Po This girl was hypnotized by Dr. Paret. She is a student from his non-verbal hypnosis master class. Dr. Paret uses special breathing and sounds and creates a movement with her head to deepen the state. The girl entered a deeper state of crisis, where she started moving her body back and forth uncontrollably. To be continued in part 3.  Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
